info.name: userstyles.org Forum Private Message Notification
info.description:
Gives you a visible notification if there is/are unread private message(s) in Forum.

Feel free to modify and add this to your userstyles.
info.additionalInfo:
This is bookmarklet to test this style. Run this bookmarklet in userstyles forum.

javascript:(function(){var%20inbox=document.querySelector(%22li.Inbox%20a%22);if(inbox.lastChild.nodeName==%22SPAN%22)inbox.removeChild(inbox.lastChild);else{var%20span=document.createElement(%22span%22);span.textContent=%221%22;inbox.appendChild(span)}})()
